name: Oboz Sawtooth II Low Light Trail Shoes - Men's
categories: Sawtooth II Low Light Trail Shoes
description: Durable enough for brushy trails and versatile enough to lace up every day. These well-built shoes have go-to technical features and provide a nice, supportive ride.Nubuck leather and abrasion-resistant mesh fabric uppers provide a good balance between protection and breathability.Quick-drying breathable nylon mesh linings.Asymmetric collar increases comfort around the ankle.External rubber heel counter for protection and stability.Dual-density EVA midsole provides cushioning and support.Nylon shank provides lateral and torsional stability.High-abrasion, high-friction Oboz carbon rubber outsoles.Deep aggressive lugs in a multi-directional pattern for effective propulsion and braking.
